channel.title: Near Future V2 - Innovating the future | Eco/Spawn | Master| Instant Pk! Pre- Be
channel.description:
[CENTER]
[IMG]http://i45.tinypic.com/20iysz4.png[/img]
Near Future V2 - Innovating the future | Eco/Spawn | Master| Instant Pk!|
I ended up closing Near Future v1 due to a asshole trying to sell my old source! So i started on V2. V2 is more advanced, has alot more features and its only in Pre- Beta! so come and check it out if you want!
[IMG]http://icons.iconarchive.com/icons/icojam/onebit/16/arrow-right-icon.png[/img][url=http://www.anearfuture.com]Website[/url]||[url=http://www.anearfuture.com/Near%20Future%20-%20Innovating%20the%20future.jar][IMG]http://i42.tinypic.com/2zf1iq8.png[/img]Download Client[/url] [IMG]http://icons.iconarchive.com/icons/icojam/onebit/16/arrow-right-icon.png[/img][url=http://www.anearfuture.com/webclient.html]Webclient![/url]||
Staff List Owners: Steeze Head-Administrator: Administrators: Head-Moderator: Moderators:
Features
Great Community Amazing Staff Most items spawnable master and pure command at login All Working Godsword Effects Barrelchest Anchor with Correct Animations Working Report Abuse button (Sends message to online Staff) Fully Working Prayer with Draining (Also Bones on Altar Use) Sled and Basket Of Egg Correct Animations PK Point Shop More Coming Soon...
Donator Benefits
Special Hangout Area Donator Point Shop ::bank Custom yell Tags and Colors Loyalty Titles Special Forum Rank More Coming Soon...
Pictures
[img]http://i.imgflip.com/a9wg.gif[/img] [IMG]http://i48.tinypic.com/29az7s7.png[/img]
As the Server Progresses I will be updating this thread.[/CENTER]
